# Default algorithm for reading .las
las <- readLAS("/home/nibe/PROJECTS/golm_tree_analysis/data/Golm_May06_2018_Milan_UTM33N_WGS84_6digit_cl.las", filter = "-keep_first -drop_z_below 5 -drop_z_above 40")

plot(CHM, col = col)
